quote.text: You don’t always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go, and see what happens.
quote.author: Mandy Hale

scripture.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️

I’m proud of you today. You worked hard, and I hope you smiled.
And even if the day wasn’t the best .. screw it.

Tomorrow is another opportunity to shine ✨

Remember how amazing you are. Give yourself a pat on the back for just being you.
You go Queen.
